content: inside needle thus attaching the hem leg work 1 round in stockinette stitch next round knit to last 2 sts of the round place a cut c1 and continue with c2 only switch to temporary bor marker this is a temporary smaller needles if desired knit 2 rnds bor for the next 7 rnds start working the textured stitch pattern as switch to larger needles if preferred and follows attach c2 work according to chart a row 1- round 1 *sl1 k2 p1 k2* repeat * - * to the end 7 chart a is repeated 10 11 12 13 times in of the round the round round 2 knit remove the temporary bor marker and slip repeat rnds 1 and 2 a total of 6 7 8 9 times the next 2 sts onto right hand needle this is i e for 12 14 16 18 rnds or to desired leg the original bor place a bor marker if length finishing with round 2 preferred finish the stranded colourwork by working chart a row 8-34 chart a is repeated 10 11 12 13 times in the round palace gate socks page 2/4 gusset heel turn work the gusset increases as follows redistribute sts as follows the first 27 31 33 37 sts of the round on the left hand needle the round 1 work the established textured stitch last 26 30 32 36 sts of the round on the right pattern across the first 15 sts place m1 m1l hand needle and the remaining 31 33 37 39 place m2 and work the established textured sts on the cable stitch pattern until 14 sts remain in the round place m3 m1r place m4 and work the work the heel back and forth starting at the established textured stitch pattern to the end bor as follows of the round row 1 rs k3 k3 k3 k4 ssk k1 turn round 2 knit slipping the markers as you go row 2 ws sl1 p6 p6 p6 p8 p2tog p1 round 3 work the established textured stitch turn pattern to m1 sm m1l knit to m2 sm work row 3 rs sl1 knit until 1 st remains before the established textured stitch pattern to m3 the gap ssk k1 turn sm knit to m4 m1r and sm work the established textured stitch pattern to the end row 4 ws sl1 purl until 1 st remains before of the round the gap p2tog p1 turn round 4 knit slipping the markers as you go repeat row 3 and 4 until 1 unworked st remains on each side of the heel turn and repeat rnds 3 and 4 a total of 11 13 14 16 you ve just finished row 4 continue working times i e until you ve increased a total of 24 in the round 28 30 34 sts finishing with round 4 remove all markers on the last round sl1 knit until 1 st remains before the gap ssk this is
